trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] **This article uses the Azure Preview portal**
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] **This article uses the Azure Preview portal**

trans-unit.source: The [Preview portal](https://portal.azure.com/) provides access to new features and experiences on the Azure platform, and is required when using the steps and information provided in this article.
trans-unit.target: The [Preview portal](https://portal.azure.com/) provides access to new features and experiences on the Azure platform, and is required when using the steps and information provided in this article.

trans-unit.source: If you are not currently logged into your Azure subscription, you will be prompted to log in when you visit the [Preview portal](https://portal.azure.com/).
trans-unit.target: If you are not currently logged into your Azure subscription, you will be prompted to log in when you visit the [Preview portal](https://portal.azure.com/).
